Title: Pink Panther 2
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Family, Mystery
Writer: Scott Neustadter (screenplay), Michael H. Weber (screenplay), Steve Martin (screenplay), Scott Neustadter (story), Michael H. Weber (story), Maurice Richlin (characters), Blake Edwards (characters)
Actors: Steve Martin, Jean Reno, Emily Mortimer, Andy Garcia
Plot: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.
